Install¶

There are three ways to install ANNOgesic. Please refer to the following sections. Only Dockerfiles can install the requirments automatically. If you install ANNOgesic through other ways, please install the pre-required tools by yourself.

Github¶

git clone https://github.com/Sung-Huan/ANNOgesic.git

or

git clone git@github.com:Sung-Huan/ANNOgesic.git

Dockerfile¶

Please Download the Dockerfile of ANNOgesic first. Then switch to the folder which Dockerfile are located. For the following commands, please refer to here.

If you want to check Other commands of Docker, please refer to here.

pip3¶

pip3 install ANNOgesic
